mapper.select: SELECT consult.id AS id, send.username AS send_name, accept.username AS accept_name, consult.content AS content, consult.create_time AS create_time FROM consult JOIN `user` AS send ON consult.user_send_id = send.id JOIN `user` AS accept ON consult.user_accept_id = accept.id WHERE consult.consult_status = 1 AND consult.user_accept_id = #{id} AND consult.`status` = 0 LIMIT #{page}, #{limit}
